name: Cross Country Computer
tag_list: database, database-management, marketing-database, data-hygiene, email-services, roi, campaign-management, matchback, mergepurge, ncoa, append, modeling, analysis, list-rental-fulfillment
overview: Cross Country Computer specializes in bringing strategic marketing within the reach of all companies seeking to evolve their methods and turn the ROI equation back in their favor. CCC’s industry experts and robust direct marketing data management solutions make it easier for you to acquire, retain and develop valuable customers. Core competencies - marketing databases, data hygiene, email services - extend beyond traditional B2C applications to include a wealth of innovative best-of-breed solutions specific to the challenges of B2B marketers.
